name: Coronakiller (FuzzyCatGames)
description:
Welcome to Coronakiller!

In this game you play as one of the defenders of our body - the Antibody.

You have been informed that COVID-19 has entered the body. Your task is to kill them as much as possible and not to miss more than 5 viruses. #arcade #adventure #coronavirus #coronakiller #covid #stayathome
